text: So, what will you be able to achieve once you finish Module 3? Firstly, you should understand and be able to use composite volume profiles. You should be able to interpret the significance of volume in the volume profile. You should then be able to differentiate and use high volume and low volume to formulate various strategies. Then, you should have a basic understanding of how the price ladder works and how you can use price ladders with volume profiling. You should then also be able to understand what I mean by the trading secret. You should also understand the art of trading with probabilities. You should be able to use, interpret and profit from 11 unique playbook strategies including the anomaly, momentum, trend and reversal strategies which I'm going to show you and I'm going to spend a lot of time developing with you so that you have a unique set of trading strategies that you can take forward. You should then be able to develop your own unique strategies with advanced understanding of profiling techniques. So it's all good and well, I'm going to teach you some amazing strategies, but most important I want you to be able to go and develop your own strategies and continue to improve and update your playbook going forward. Lastly, I want you to be able to have a comprehensive understanding of the Volume After all, you are now finally a specialist.
